website_summaries.verdict: A spacious bath toy storage option with a cute design.
pros: Consumers like the fun hammock design and good size of this organizer
In addition to holding many toys, it also stands out for being a good value for the cost and not taking up too much space
cons: Some had problems with the suction cups
The large holes mean it won't work for very small toys

customer_reviews.title: ... could give this 5 stars but the mesh is pretty small and the suction does not last
customer_reviews.text: Now - I wish I could give this 5 stars but the mesh is pretty small and the suction does not last. They gave some incredibly strong sticky stuff to put inside the suction cups - HOWEVER - if you try to move it you no longer get that strong hold. So now I am stuck with a net that is always dropping all the toys into the tub because it doesn't stick anymore and I can't seem to find something else that works. It is also a pretty small hammock. Works well in size for a newborn with a few ducks and bath letters but I can't imagine it would hold much more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product holds all of my son's bath toys, the suction cups work well but I felt that I wanted it to be extra secure so I adhered it to the bath tile with the 3M adhesive provided for each suction cup. The toothbrush holder is such a good idea as my son would tip over a toothbrush holder and send his toothbrush flying. Super cute! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa H.

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups didn't work for us..
customer_reviews.text: So the product is as expected...too bad the suction cups just wouldn't stick for us despite numerous tries over several days following the instructions juuuuuuuuust so. We ended up having to use the adhesive tabs and since then they've been up for a couple of weeks with out issue. We live in a rented apartment so I believe our shower wall is one of those 'all in one' bath insert that goes over an old tub and shower; not porcelain, not tile..maybe textured fiberglass? At any rate, hopefully the adhesive doesnt leave a residue at removal.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Cute and holds a lot of toys!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bath net for my kids bathroom. I was skeptical when I purchased, but so far I'm impressed! They have a lot of bath toys, and this net holds them all. It's been a few days and the suction cups are still holding strong. And it is so cute too! I'll update my review if I start having issues with the suction cups, but for now, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kells

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Genius!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! It is adorable and holds my sons MANY bath toys. The application is very easy and the product comes with extra sticky stuff to put onto the suctions so they stay in place and can hold a lot. Yes, the sticky stuff is removable as well. The whale design is perfect. We had bought a faucet protector from target before he was born that was a whale as well so it matches. It is also small enough that if an adult were to shower in the same bathroom it would not be in the way at all! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it is fine for holding up bunch of foam letters
customer_reviews.text: First less star is for falling off 5 minutes after I put it on (could be my negligence for not cleaning wall tiles squeaky clean). Second minus star is for being way smaller than it seems in picture. Otherwise it is fine for holding up bunch of foam letters.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great toy storage solution!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these to keep my sons toys up out of the way in the tub. These work great. There are quite a few reviews saying that the suction cups don’t stick that good.... if you just wet the suction cups before sticking them on and they are on a smooth surface (mine is smooth tile) then three will work great!! My seem like they would never fall!
customer_reviews.author: caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Suction didn't last long but used the tape that came with it and it's been stuck where I put it for a couple of weeks filled with toys
customer_reviews.author: Jessica c

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I found this thing
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found this thing! My son's toys were taking over our bathtub. Now I have a nice neat place to put them and don't have to trip over them while showering. The tape that comes with the suction cups is also a great touch. It keeps them attached to the shower walls perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: awesome buy for CHEAP!
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions by cleaning well before sticking them on the wall. Also let them hang on the wall with nothing in the net overnight. I did not need to wipe the wall with the rubbing alcohol or use the command strips. We have a few larger toys and smaller squeezable bath toys, probably 2-3 lbs worth. So far, it has never fallen off the wall and it has been installed for 2 weeks. Great buy for $3!!!
customer_reviews.author: DonahueFam

customer_reviews.title: Be carful
customer_reviews.text: This is way cool and I like how when we rinse the shower down after each use the yuck is not collected on her bats toys and the toothbrush holder is a bonus however they charged me for two and sent me one and when I brought it to amazons attention they opened a investigation and I never was refunded :(
customer_reviews.author: THATS RIGHT!

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this product was going to hold almost nothing... but it actually work extremely well. My child love picking up her toys and outing them all on the hammock.
customer_reviews.author: L Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Great value, can hold a bit of bath toys.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when my wife purchased these, but I'm a changed man. We just had another baby, so I took over bath time for our son. These things are a life saver for those who like order to a child's chaos. They say attached to the wall, and they hold a bit of weight. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Pj & Becky

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy. Crap Product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. Super small, barely holds anything. Neither the suction cups or the adhesive pads worked. Kept falling down and dumping toys everywhere. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michèle Marie Paré

customer_reviews.title: No suction for us. So that sucks.
customer_reviews.text: We should have kept the packaging and returned this before it was too late. We couldn't get it to stick to our shower walls at all. It fell down even without toys in it. Yes we cleaned the shower first, we aren't animals!
customer_reviews.author: Darin G.

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this !! Stays in place hasn't came off since I put it up (as my old one did) this is amazing !! And the toothbrush holder is a great bonus. I'm a very happy customer ! I am usually lazy to write reviews but I truly am very pleased with my purchase and highly recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: ... with 3M sticky tabs to secure the suction cups better to the tile
customer_reviews.text: Comes with 3M sticky tabs to secure the suction cups better to the tile, but still falls down about once every two weeks and we dont have half as many toys in it as the stock photo shows.
customer_reviews.author: cj428m1

customer_reviews.title: Bathtub Landmine No More!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars so far. Arrived fast(thanks Prime), exactly as described. It came with 3M adhesive if you need it, but we used the suction cups on textured (read cheap plastic) shower wall and it still works like a charm. Kiddo actually enjoys clean up with this and his big bros will appreciate not having to step over the toy landmine while they shower. We haven't significantly stress tested it (7 toys in it at the moment), but we followed the instruction of not putting weight on it initially and it's held up well over the last few days.
customer_reviews.author: TrueReview

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t stick to my wall
customer_reviews.text: I could only get 2 sides to stick to my wall, the 3rd I could never get to stick. Waste of money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Rose

customer_reviews.title: don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: don't recommend buying does not stay on the suction sucks
customer_reviews.author: ISAAK DIAZ

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this because we have several metric truck loads of foam bath blocks and squirters for the kids. The net is a good size and holds a surprising amount of toys. Plus, I had a question about this product that I sent to the seller and they got back to me right away with useful answers.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur T

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. has stayed put since install.
customer_reviews.text: Has stayed on our shower wall perfectly. We made sure to follow the instructions specifically when installing and it has not budged. Wish it was just a little bit bigger (we have too many bath toys!) but i am a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Schlough

customer_reviews.title: Tubby toys contained
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely to keep tubby toys organized. It's a little on the small side, but holds the foam alphabet and number set pretty well, and the whale suction cups hold the net up reliably.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT AND COMPANY
customer_reviews.text: The MiniOwls Bathtub Toy Storage Hammock has been a huge help! It has provided extra space and storage for our 2 year old's toys. We do not have a bathtub and therefore need room for him to store toys at chest height. He loves grabbing toys out and cleaning up in this handy hammock. I Highly recommend this product and organization.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Love it! No issues, just follow the instructions when installing.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: small, doesn't hold much
customer_reviews.text: keeps falling off the tub wall if more than a few small toys are added. No way does it hold the number of toys seen in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: MellyWhoDo

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Makes the tub much neater and allows for the kids toys to dry completely in between uses. The suction cups work great so far. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea and worked well for short period of time. Just doesn't stay stuck to wall even with the included adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi I

customer_reviews.title: This product does not stick to the tile/wall in my ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does not stick to the tile/wall in my bathroom over tub (as shown in photo). I have tried everything in order to make it stick! Any recommendations?
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Harness

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold much and he things never stayed on the wall for more than a day so then I’d be stuck picking up all the toys
customer_reviews.author: Edith G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bath storage net!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Space saver! Matches great with whale bath mat and whale spout cover.
customer_reviews.author: erikmalinowski

customer_reviews.title: We love this for our little boy
customer_reviews.text: We love this for our little boy! Sticks well and holds toys without falling down! I also like that the toys aren’t sitting inside something because they get moldy. This happened with our last product that we bought. With this netting you don’t have that issue! Now it’s safe for baby. Plus it looks great. I really liked the hooks that it came with. I use them for many things. Great product and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made though
customer_reviews.text: Too small and holes are too big. I should have looked at dimensions before buying. Nicely made though. Just not what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle-Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: So cute and has way better suction power than I ever expected. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little hammock net to hold toys
customer_reviews.text: I waited a couple of weeks to write the review to make sure it was still hanging and it it! Great little hammock net to hold toys. Not too big and not Too small. I followed directions exactly for hanging and it is still holding up. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Stored a ton of toys well, suction cups dont work well. Great if you're using it with an adhesive to keep it up.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Continually falls, even when nothing is in it. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I really have no problems with this. It comes with some extra adhesive circles and we used those and it hasn’t fallen at all. My son keeps some pretty heavy bath toys in it as well. I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: France Henigman

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the cutest bath toy storage. My daughter loves the whale. It’s pretty sturdiness, haven’t fall since we put it up like other suction bath toy storage.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was skeptical at first because it fell down twice BUT then I finally looked at the instructions (lol) and now it works perfectly. BONUS, I didn't completely realize there were whales on it until I got it and our kids' bathroom is ocean themed so it fits perfectly and holds everything I need it to. Definitely recommend it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Small and falls down often even after we've secured with the adhesive strips provided.
customer_reviews.author: EAP

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups suck
customer_reviews.text: Suction doesn’t hold well and the back up tape doesn’t either...
customer_reviews.author: Artsyfartsygyrl

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful
customer_reviews.text: Just gave it to my niece for Chirstmas for her baby's bath toys. She was pleased to get it, but I haven't heard yet how it is working out for her.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Was hoping it would be just a little bigger, but it might stretch out with use.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla D. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: falls with too much weight
customer_reviews.text: it falls down with too much but i have a couple of rubber ducks in it and it holds fine
customer_reviews.author: Average Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of looking around before deciding on this product, and it did not disappoint! It is really well made, easy to set up, and holds a lot of toys. The suction cups make it easy to adjust and they hold really well. The whales that cover each suction cup are a nice added touch, and makes it look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Cool product. Tooth brush holder works great!
customer_reviews.text: Cool product, but one of the whales fell off instantly. Not a big deal, but I hope the rest last. The tooth brush holder is really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Mcwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute and works well even when loaded with a lot of toys!
customer_reviews.author: Edmond, OK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bath toy holder!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and I just ordered another.. I feel like it’s perfect because the water won’t pile up as it would in a confined space. No problems with it not suctioning to the tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best bath hammock!
customer_reviews.text: Great bath hammock!! Fell down a couple of times until i read the directions for best way to secure the hammock, hasnt fallen off since! My son loves pulling out his toys and the bonus tooth brush holder is so cute! I highly recommend this! ❤
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is great for bath toys! Suction cups stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This net is great! The water doesn’t sit on the toys and make them mold like our last tub caddy did. My sons really love the whales too.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than it looks and can tend to let loose which can cause a mess. Works for us.
customer_reviews.author: SoDak12

customer_reviews.title: The suctions are just under 2 inches wide so if you have real small this might not be good for you
customer_reviews.text: Serves it's purpose and it's cute. The suctions are just under 2 inches wide so if you have real small this might not be good for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for bath toys!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toy hammock. It looks small at first, but really stretches out and hold a lot of toys. I followed the instructions for putting it up and it sticks like a champ! Also comes with a cute matching hook for your toothbrush, but i use it for my son's washcloth.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: I love it it feel down a couple times but now ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it it feel down a couple times but now it's perfect my daughter loves putting her bath toys away n there not just thrown all over bath tub I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bath toy organiser
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bath toy organiser. It is exactly as shown in the pictures. After reading some of the reviews I expected it to be smaller, but it is the perfect size - holds a lot of toys without being bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Ralitsa Veleva

customer_reviews.title: Could be improved
customer_reviews.text: Not sticking too great but the extra pads have helped slightly. Not great for heavy bath items
customer_reviews.author: Neil Best

customer_reviews.title: I was not happy with the mini owl bath toy storage hammock
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with the mini owl bath toy storage hammock. I could not get one of the three owls to stick. No matter what I tried, it never worked. I did however, like the toothbrush holder. It is wonderful! It is attached to the mirror and holds an electric toothbrush, and I have never had a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: shanelle

customer_reviews.title: So cute and it was the perfect size for our sons bath toys
customer_reviews.text: So cute and it was the perfect size for our sons bath toys. The suction cups didn't stick at first but after cleaning the wall surface with some rubbing alcohol and making sure there's no air bubbles when you put the suction cups on, it stays up great now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't stick to shower wall
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't stick to our shower wall even with following the instructions. In contacted the company and they said using double-sided tape might help. It is a cute design, though, just wish we could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Leana F

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work out for me, my son has ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work out for me, my son has a lot of big toys and it didn't hold but it might work well for you! The quality was great

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it, suction doesn't work. Extremely disappointed and looking for alternatives.

customer_reviews.title: Weak Suction Cups
customer_reviews.text: Suction cups are of very poor quality and will not stick for more than 5 seconds. Don't buy this set.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Have no issues and it's holding 15 baby bath squirt toys!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mugs... Great design, big, machine washable and very sturdy. What more could you want?

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes!! My kids toys are out of the floor of the tub!!

customer_reviews.title: Had to use adhesive strips to apply suction cups to ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to use adhesive strips to apply suction cups to my tile shower wall. After about 6 weeks, suction cups began to fall off adhesive. Can be at least temporarily re-attached with 30 seconds of pressure applied.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Orr

customer_reviews.title: Bath toy storage
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Holds a fine amount of toys and a decent weight. If the tiles are clean and dry, and the suction cups are wet when applied, it should stay adhered. Great storage solution!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All the toys drain well and stays well to the walls. Toothbrush holder to match was a cute touch

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.text: Great for organizing all the bath toys and super cute.

customer_reviews.title: ... toy holders and this one is by far my favorite. It doesn't take up a ton of room
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through so many tub toy holders and this one is by far my favorite. It doesn't take up a ton of room, it's high enough that my 1 year old can pull everything out, and toys do not get moldy! Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Love the toy hammock
customer_reviews.text: Love the toy hammock. It was a little slippery at first, but after it stuck, it's stuck really good. My grand-daughter has a ton of toys it it and they are all kept out of the way so I can still take a bath

customer_reviews.title: Great product works better than any of the other 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product works better than any of the other 3 style I have tried. The plastic does not get all nasty and gunky like others and sticks very well, still sticking strong.

customer_reviews.text: Love this, it matches our other whale-themed bathroom gadgets (faucet protector, etc), was super easy to instal and holds a ton of toys.

customer_reviews.title: Great find - Great Purchase - Amazing Customer Service

customer_reviews.title: Happy, satisfied, and Organized.
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Shipped and came in no time. Now I'm not stepping on tub toys while I'm in the shower! You know, because it's all about me. :) Nice quality, attractive design!
customer_reviews.author: mary oneill

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick very well. Their recommendation was to just ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stick very well. Their recommendation was to just glue it to the tub wall... There are however periods where it sticks for weeks before one falls off. If it does, it will not stay back on without a throughly incredible cleaning of the entire area and a hard smacking application followed by no weight bearing for a day or so. But we're still using it so I guess the inconvenience did not outweigh the benefit of use.

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product ! It is cheap and super small !

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Perfect way to keep the bathroom tidy
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Perfect way to keep the bathroom tidy. And I put it up and it hasn't come down once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: MiniOwls Bathtub Toy Storage Hammock Comes with Free Toothbrush Holder, Organizes Bathroom Ducks and Sponges. Keeps Toys Dry and Mold Free. Perfect for Smooth Tiles. (Cute Blue Whales)
feature_bullets: ★ Top rated storage solution for bath toys that will help you RE-CLAIM BATHROOM SPACE while providing a safe environment for children to bathe & play in.

★ A hook for a washcloth & a FREE TOOTHBRUSH HOLDER help in organizing many bathing essentials. Makes a great gift idea for a special occasion (baby shower, kid's birthdays and housewarming gift option).
★ Airy netting design, easily drains water & allows air circulation which creates a MOLD & MILDEW FREE TOY environment.
★ Three HEAVY DUTY WHALE SUCTION CUPS make sure that the toy storage net stays stuck to SMOOTH SURFACE tiles, glass shower cabin or any mirror.
